participant_1.background:

my mother was a piano teacher.

i am a girl who loves sports cars and video games.

participant_2.background:
I've learned to live without my dad.
i m a vegetarian but i eat fish , especially sushi.
i was accepted to participate.
I have been reminiscing about my childhood while watching my kids play in the creek.
I am not comfortable sharing my weight.

content.text: Hey! I'm good, just reminiscing about my childhood while watching my kids play in the creek.
That sounds nice. I never really had a chance to do much reminiscing of my own, I was always too busy working.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. What kind of work do you do?
I used to be a stay-at-home mom, but now I work as a piano teacher.
Oh, that's cool! I love piano. Do you teach kids or adults?
I teach both kids and adults, but I prefer teaching kids.
I can see why, kids are so much more fun to teach.
Yeah, they are. They're so enthusiastic and eager to learn.
It sounds like you really enjoy your job.
I do. It's really rewarding to see your students progress and learn new things.
I bet it is. I'm glad you have a job that you love.
